titleStmt.title: The spouses hidden glory, and faithfull leaning upon her wellbeloved. Wherein is laid down the soules glory in Christ, and the way by which the soule comes to Christ. Delivered in two lecture sermons in St. Andrewes church in Norwich. / By Iohn Collings Master of Arts, and preacher of Gods word in Saviours parish in Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Collinges, John, 1623-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Franckling, and are to bee sold at his shop near the signe of the George in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop near the signe of the George in Norwich
